content.rendered:
Today, time is precious. Between the stresses of work, errands and social activities, nothing can cause more of an inconvenience than car troubles. Our vehicles get us where we need to go, and without them, we can feel helpless.
Mobile windshield repair has major benefits, like the following:

Convenience

As we said, time is precious. Thus, a service that works with us without imposing on our time is much appreciated. Mobile windshield services provide this: the windshield technicians come to you, without requiring an appointment at a garage. Whether your car is parked at home, at work or at the mall, your windshield can be serviced by a team equipped with the necessary tools for the job, all while you carry on as normal.

Safety

If left untreated, cracks or chips in your windshield can grow, impairing the driver’s view and eventually requiring replacement. A mobile service addresses these cracks while they are fresh, preventing them from getting worse and delaying the need for a new windshield. In the event of impaired vision, the mobile service can replace the entire windshield as well, which is a safe alternative to attempting the drive to a garage.

Professional Care

Mobile windshield repair teams are staffed by the same professionals that would service your vehicle in the repair shop. This means that even though your car is being repaired parked in your driveway or a parking lot, the work is being done by the most qualified experts.

Insurance Coverage

Since the work is completed by professionals, mobile windshield repairs are covered by most auto insurance. A high percentage of auto insurance companies only require that the repairs be performed by qualified professionals in order to be covered.
If you have questions or are in need of mobile windshield repair, call Frank’s Auto Glass at (773) 488-7700.
